page.title: 06HOME LIFE
page.content: {ROBERT'S WEEKEND. On Friday evening Robert and his family went to the Aberaman Band Club presentation disco and buffet.Robert was presented with trophies for the under-12 football team. On Saturday Robert spent most of the day playing football with his friends. His mother took his sister to ballet lessons and then went shopping in Aberdare.In the evening relatives from Portsmouth came to visit.On Sunday the family went to their holiday caravan on the Gower peninsula where they usually spend their weekends.They picked strawberries and then went for a walk along the beach.They also visited Swansea Leisure Centre where they had great fun in the swimming pool which has a wave-making machine and a huge perspex water chute.Sunday evening they all returned home.
